means: 司仪神父，天主教主领弥撒的神父

sentence.Network_en: Celebrant and Sandy, may you love deeply, laugh heartily, practice patience and smile often.
sentence.Network_cn: 王维嘉, 双婷,希望你们的爱情可以坚深, 由衷的快乐, 学习忍耐,保持笑口常开.

sentence.Network_en: The wedding celebrant gives a brief welcome and an introductory speech before announcing the bride's entrance.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚礼监礼人给出了简短的欢迎和介绍性讲话,才宣布新娘的入口.

sentence.Network_en: Sitting : When sitting the celebrant is still presiding . Therefore, one should sit up straight in chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐姿应坐直,双手应放在双膝上或合手放在大腿上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French célébrant or Latin celebrant- 'celebrating', from the verb celebrare (see celebrate)

entry.tran: 宗教仪式主持人(或参加者)
entry.def: A celebrant is a person who performs or takes part in a religious ceremony.

means.word_mean: 2. an officiating priest celebrating the Eucharist

auth_sentence.content: And our first celebrant today is Reverend Dr. Cynthia Hale, who will deliver our opening prayer.
